text: Roman Zhuravskyi (; 3 June 1948 – 19 February 2017) was a Ukrainian professional football player who played as defender. He was born in Lviv, Ukraine. Zhuravskyi made his professional career in the different football teams of the Ukrainian SSR.Не стало Романа Журавського Zhuravskyi died on 19 February 2017 in Lviv, Ukraine from pancreatic cancer at the age of 68. ==Honours== *Soviet Top League (1) with FC Dynamo Kyiv: 1971 * Master of Sport of the USSR (1971) ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from pancreatic cancer Category:Footballers from Lviv
title: Roman Zhuravskyi
